MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in Sound Lane, Sound Heath, Wrenbury Heath Road and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:15pm to repair the network following a grounded overhead line. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:30pm on 1st February 2021.
